    • Method Detail

      • addNewPost

        @PostMapping("/products/newpost")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.http.HttpStatus> addNewPost​(@RequestBody
                                                                                               Post post)
                                                                                        throws MissingDataException,
                                                                                               UserNotFoundException,
                                                                                               PostIdAlreadyExistException,
                                                                                               OverActualDateException
        This is the US 0005 Endpoint, which enable the option to register a new post
        Parameters:
        post - the complete post with user id, id post, date, detail, category and price. Its mapped for an post request
        Returns:
        an OK status if all is correct, BAD_REQUEST if not
        Throws:
        MissingDataException - If detail or date are null values
        UserNotFoundException - If the user id included in the post hasn't been found
        PostIdAlreadyExistException - If the post id is already used on a different post
        OverActualDateException - If the date included in the post is over the actual date

      • getFollowedUserPosts

        @GetMapping("/products/followed/{userId}/list")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PostDTOFollowedList> getFollowedUserPosts​(@PathVariable
                                                                                         int userId,
                                                                                         @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                         java.lang.String order)
                                                                                  throws IncorrectOrderTypeException
        This is the US 0006/0009 Endpoint, which enable the option to get a list of the post made by the followed sellers with a maximum antiquity of 2 weeks ago
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the user to get his followed sellers
        order - Optional parameter which allows the user to choose a sort order
        Returns:
        the user id and a list of followed post sorted by desc by default
        Throws:
        IncorrectOrderTypeException - if the order defined was an unknown sorting type

      • addNewPromotionPost

        @PostMapping("/products/newpromopost")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.http.HttpStatus> addNewPromotionPost​(@RequestBody
                                                                                                        Post post)
                                                                                                 throws MissingDataException,
                                                                                                        UserNotFoundException,
                                                                                                        PostIdAlreadyExistException,
                                                                                                        OverActualDateException
        This is the US 0010 Endpoint, which enable the option to register a new promotion post
        Parameters:
        post - the complete post with user id, id post, date, detail, category and price. Its mapped for an post request
        Returns:
        an OK status if all is correct, BAD_REQUEST if not
        Throws:
        MissingDataException - If detail or date are null values
        UserNotFoundException - If the user id included in the post hasn't been found
        PostIdAlreadyExistException - If the post id is already used on a different post
        OverActualDateException - If the date included in the post is over the actual date

      • getPostPromoCount

        @GetMapping("/products/{userId}/countPromo")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PostDTOPromoCount> getPostPromoCount​(@PathVariable
                                                                                    int userId)
                                                                             throws UserNotFoundException
        This is the US 0011 Endpoint, which enable the option to get the promotion posts count of an specific seller
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the seller
        Returns:
        the seller id (as userId), the seller name (as userName) and the promotion posts count
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - If the user id hasn't been found

      • getAllPromotionPost

        @GetMapping("/products/{userId}/list")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PostDTOAllPostList> getAllPromotionPost​(@PathVariable
                                                                                       int userId)
                                                                                throws UserNotFoundException
        This is the US 0012 Endpoint, which enable the option to get a list of all promotion posts of an specific seller
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the seller
        Returns:
        the seller id (as userId), the seller name (as userName) and a list of all his promotion posts
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - If the user was not found
